con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://research.sun.com/wadl/2006/10"> <doc/> <resources base="http://localhost:8080/"> <resource path="accountcreation"> <method name="GET" id="viewAccountRegistration"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Register a new account">The account register service can be used to fill in account registration forms.</doc> <response> <representation mediaType="text/html"/> </response> </method> <method name="POST" id="createUserAccount"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Register a new account">Creating the account after having filled in the registration form.</doc> <request> <param type="xs:string" style="query" name="username" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc>The username</doc> </param> <param type="xs:string" style="query" name="password" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc>The password</doc> </param> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="text/html"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resources> </application>
